name: Sleep Paralysis Gremlins
description:
"You better watch out....."

Each color grants the gremlins a different ability. Find out what they are and get enough Sleep Paralysis Gremlins to the bed of their next target.

 The Gremlins are depending on you in order to continue their reign of terror!!

A puzzle platformer. 

Art, Narrative: Skylar (@skyesongss, BlueCravat#2752)

Programming:  Ruben (@Erasmus31, Erasmus31#5251), Bilal (Shadowstrik8r#0672)
